rules_text:
This land enters tapped with two oil counters on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
[i]Memory of Fossil Energy – [/i]{T}, Remove an oil counter from this land: Add one mana of any color.
[i]Memento of All Organisms[/i] – {1}, {T}, Remove an oil counter from this land: Create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
